queue.paused: Match was opened on another browser or device

matchmaking.abandon-body: Are you sure you want to abandon this match? It will be reported as a loss and your rating will be affected.
matchmaking.dispute-body: Are you sure you want to dispute this match? A discord channel will be created and you will be required to provide evidence within {{hours}} hours.
matchmaking.dispute-placeholder: Please enter your reason for filing a dispute...

system.conflict: Both players did not report the same winner. Please submit again.
system.mii-fighter-disclosure: A Mii Fighter has been chosen, please disclose your moveset.
system.opponent-abandon: Your opponent has abandoned the match. You will be recorded as the winner.

dispute-match.resolved: The match dispute has been resolved.
dispute-match.rating-not-adjusted: Your ratings have not been adjusted.
dispute-match.new-channel: You will see a new channel that you are in under the 'Open Disputes' category.
dispute-match.post-evidence: Post any evidence you may have to assist the moderators in making a ruling.
dispute-match.ruling-note: Note: Rulings may not be decided quickly, please be patient.
dispute-match.evidence: You have 1 HOUR to provide evidence in your favor.
dispute-match._join: Join our discord server <1><2 href="https://discord.gg/6H9wjkzQK3" target="_new">by clicking here</2></1>
dispute-match.join: Join our discord server <1>by clicking here

search.empty: Who do you want to search for?
